entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
